text: Abdul Malek Sarkar is a Jatiya Party (Ershad) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Dinajpur-1. ==Career== Sarkar was elected to parliament from Dinajpur-1 as a Jatiya Party candidate in 1986. ==References== Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:Living people Category:3rd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Abdul Malek Sarkar
